# Calendar.Component.yearForWeekOfYear

**Case**

Identifier for the week-counting year unit.

## Declaration

```swift
case yearForWeekOfYear
```

## Discussion

See the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/DateComponents] property [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/DateComponents/yearForWeekOfYear] for a discussion of the semantics of this component.

## Specifying Years and Months

- **Calendar.Component.era**: Identifier for the era unit.
- **Calendar.Component.year**: Identifier for the year unit.
- **Calendar.Component.quarter**: Identifier for the quarter of the calendar.
- **Calendar.Component.month**: Identifier for the month unit.

items.description: Identifier for the quarter of the calendar.
